author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2211](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2211): Triggers for LLP searches.
  - [CMSHLT-2221](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2221): New DoubleTau+Jet HLT path for H→ττ and HH→bbττ.
  - [CMSHLT-2224](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2224): New VBF+ττ HLT path for H→ττ.
  - [CMSHLT-2240](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2240): Removal of τ+MET triggers.
  - [CMSHLT-2241](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2241): Removal of outdated γγ HLT path.
  - [CMSHLT-2243](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2243): Removal of obsolete Run-2 Scouting paths.

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X`
